venue.address_1: Will be provided to those who RSVP
venue.name: Stacy and Ingo's House

item.description:
Wondering what new and different dishes you're going to be serving along side your bird for Thanksgiving dinner? How about borrowing innovative ideas from friends?

We'll be having a Thanksgiving Recipe Swap. Here's how it works...

Everyone who attends will bring their favorite dish and printouts of the recipe. Then we all share in tasting the food and everyone leaves with pages full of new recipes.

Best recipes to bring....
- Something unique that your family created
- An recipe that your personal heritage/culture likes to enjoy on holidays
- Your absolute favorite dish that you couldn't live without
- A vegetarian specialty that wakes up a meatless plate

Time: 5 pm - 7:30 pm

Place: Our home in West Roxbury (bordering Brookline and Jamaica Plain).
***Note: I will provide the exact address and my phone number to those who RSVP.***

It's easy to get here from all over Boston - we're inside the 128 corridor. Also great for those in Boston not wanting to drive - we're just 1 block from the Commuter Rail Bellevue Station (13 minutes from Back Bay, 17 minutes from South Station)!

Want to take the Commuter Rail? Take the Needham Line to Bellevue Station. A train arrives here at 6:21pm which will get you here just in time. There are trains back to the city at 7:43 and 9:20.

Hope to see you all there!

-Stacy and Ingo
item.name: Pre-Thanksgiving Recipe Swap
